fields.name: :interrobang: Who the f is S.V.G!?
fields.value: Vsevolod S.V.G [es-ve-djei] Subbotkin (<@236926320595042304>) - content creator who makes videos for YouTube to his channel, likes playing games and watch the most animated stuff (cartoons and anime), also likes doing video editing (montage) (to mention what he's doing mentioned above), creating design and doing some coding stuff with various programming languages.

fields.name: :interrobang: What is this server!?
fields.value: This server S.V.G created to connect people with mutual interests in one place to discuss, share, talk and have fun or also to play together. S.V.G everytime tries his best to make this server as better and comfortable place for everyone.

fields.name: :interrobang: Will this S.V.G give some attention!?
fields.value: Yes, that fa... good person when has free time and ability will give some attention and talk with everyone and also play some games together.

fields.name: :interrobang: S.V.G BOT commands!?
fields.value: All <@690342724335173823> commands you can find here: https://vsevolod982.tumblr.com/svgbotcmds

> :interrobang: **Want to invite friends here?!**
> Then give them this invite link https://discord.gg/AGSgvqz and we wait for them.

embed.description:
```diff
-  ------------------------------------------------------  -
-                       SERVER RULES                       -
-  ------------------------------------------------------  -```

:red_circle: Treat everyone with respect. Do not swear too much.
:red_circle: Don't spam with unnecessary messages, links and files. You can promote yourself but don't get carried away. Do not distribute viruses or any other harmful stuff.
:red_circle: Keep all specified topic messages and discussions in topic specified channels. If you don't have access to specific channels, [you have to get your needed role for that below](https://discord.com/channels/720299122489294889/720315483110244384).
:red_circle: Everything related to games and cooperative playing must be in gaming text channels.
:red_circle: 18+ content or erotic or pornographic content only in NSFW text channels.

Not following rules will result as punishment like banishment from server (kick or ban if kicking not helping).

`   -----   GAMES   -----   `
